level.text: A person may operate a PSP and one or more affiliated businesses, provided each affiliated business is operated in compliance with all applicable provisions of this title and other applicable laws.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 6993 (May 17, 2013); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 10975 (July 26, 2013).
